insert into t_za_wbdwsh (id, jgbh, tjrsfzh, tjrjh, tjrxm, tjdwdm, tjdwmc, tjsj, czlx, shrjh, shrxm, shrsfzh, shdwdm, shdwmc, shsj, shzt, zxsj, zxyy,sfyx) values (#[id], #[jgbh], #[tjrsfzh], #[tjrjh], #[tjrxm], #[tjdwdm], #[tjdwmc], to_date(#[tjsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #[czlx], #[shrjh], #[shrxm], #[shrsfzh], #[shdwdm], #[shdwmc], to_date(#[shsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #[shzt], to_date(#[zxsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #[zxyy],#[sfyx])

select id, jgbh, tjrsfzh, tjrjh, tjrxm, tjdwdm, tjdwmc, to_char(tjsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as tjsj, czlx, shrjh, shrxm, shrsfzh, shdwdm, shdwmc, to_char(shsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as shsj, shzt, zxsj, zxyy ,sfyx from t_za_wbdwsh where jgbh = ? order by tjsj desc

select sh.id, dw.dwmc, sh.jgbh, sh.tjrsfzh, sh.tjrjh, sh.tjrxm, sh.tjdwdm, sh.tjdwmc, sh.tjsj, sh.czlx, sh.shrjh, sh.shrxm, sh.shrsfzh, sh.shdwdm, sh.shdwmc, sh.shsj, sh.shzt, sh.zxsj, sh.zxyy, sh.sfyx from t_za_wbdwsh sh,t_za_jg_jbxx dw where sh.jgbh = dw.jgbh and sh.sfyx = '0' #if($jwsqdm && !$jwsqdm.equals("")) and sh.tjdwdm = #[jwsqdm] #elseif($pcsdm && !$pcsdm.equals("")) and (sh.tjdwdm like substr(#[pcsdm],1,8)||'%') #elseif($countrygajgjgdm && !$countrygajgjgdm.equals("")) and sh.tjdwdm like substr(#[countrygajgjgdm],1,6)||'%' #elseif($citygajgjgdm && !$citygajgjgdm.equals("")) and sh.tjdwdm like substr(#[citygajgjgdm],1,4)||'%' #end #if($dwmc && !$dwmc.equals("")) and dw.dwmc like '%'||#[dwmc]||'%' #end #if($czzt && !$czzt.equals("")) and sh.czlx = #[czzt] #end #if($shzt && !$shzt.equals("")) and sh.shzt = #[shzt] #end #if($tjsj_start && !$tjsj_start.equals("")) and sh.tjsj >= to_date(#[tjsj_start]||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') #end #if($tjsj_end && !$tjsj_end.equals("")) and sh.tjsj <= to_date(#[tjsj_end]||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') #end #if($shsj_start && !$shsj_start.equals("")) and sh.shsj >= to_date(#[shsj_start]||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') #end #if($shsj_end && !$shsj_end.equals("")) and sh.shsj <= to_date(#[shsj_end]||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') #end order by tjsj,id desc

select dw.dwmc,sh.id, sh.jgbh, sh.tjrsfzh, sh.tjrjh, sh.tjrxm, sh.tjdwdm, sh.tjdwmc, sh.tjsj, sh.czlx, sh.shrjh, sh.shrxm, sh.shrsfzh, sh.shdwdm, sh.shdwmc, sh.shsj, sh.shzt, sh.zxsj, sh.zxyy, sh.sfyx from t_za_wbdwsh sh,t_za_jg_jbxx dw where dw.jgbh = sh.jgbh and sh.id= ?
update t_za_jg_jbxx set sfzagl = ? where jgbh = ?

update t_za_wbdwsh set shrjh = #[shrjh], shrxm = #[shrxm], shrsfzh = #[shrsfzh], shdwdm = #[shdwdm], shdwmc = #[shdwmc], shsj = to_date(#[shsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), shzt = #[shzt] where id = #[id]
